nodes.text: Recon team 05 was a military unit that once participated in a conflict.

Recon team 05 consisted of the Human sniper Lev Palik and his spotter, Wren Cristol. During a conflict on a world, enemy forces dug themselves in along an established line and recon team 05 was ordered to take up a position near an enemy bunker. A group of agents were sent to attack the bunker, so they rendezvoused with recon team 05, who told the agents information about a possible entrance to the bunker.
